com.lonepulse.robozombie.util
Class Components

java.lang.Object
  com.lonepulse.robozombie.util.Components

public final class Components
extends Object

A collection of utility services for processing components attached to an endpoint contract.

Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

          Accepts a list of components which are presumably attached to a request and removes those which are skipped from execution by consulting an available @Skip annotation on the request.

Method Detail

isDetached

public static boolean isDetached(InvocationContext context,
                                 Class<? extends Annotation> type)

Determines whether the request definition has detached the given Annotation type. This will mute any annotations of the given type which are defined on the endpoint.

See Detach.

Parameters:
context - the InvocationContext which provides the request definition

type - the Annotation type whose detachment is to be determined

Returns:
true if the given Annotation type has been detached from the request

Since:
1.3.0

filterSkipped

public static <E> List<Class<? extends E>> filterSkipped(InvocationContext context,
                                                         List<Class<? extends E>> components)

Accepts a list of components which are presumably attached to a request and removes those which are skipped from execution by consulting an available @Skip annotation on the request.

See Skip.

Parameters:
context - the InvocationContext used to discover request metadata

components - the Classes of the components to be filtered

Returns:
the filtered components list which excludes those which are skipped for the given request
Since:
1.2.4
